thread.title: Kim Kardashian addresses 'new' sex tape rumours after claims of a second racy film
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian addresses 'new' sex tape rumours after claims of a second racy film

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Kim Kardashian addresses 'new' sex tape rumours after claims of a second racy film
text:
Kim Kardashian addresses 'new' sex tape rumours after claims of a second racy film The star has been forced to clear up the speculation Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Kardashian has been forced to deny rumours of a second sex tape, and insisted the new leaked footage is from the original racy video. 
The reality star's fame skyrocketed when her sex tape with ex-partner Ray J leaked back in 2007, and it was alleged that there were more images appearing online from a different clip . 
In a statement, Kim's rep has quickly moved to deny that the leaked footage is a second part to the original racy tape. (Photo: Splash News) 
"It's not new - it's the same old sex tape," they told Mail Online. 
While Kim rarely talks about her meteoric rise to fame, she revealed how she felt about the tape all these years later during a recent interview. Kim's rep said the 'new' footage is from the original tape (Photo: Getty) 
“If I do have one regret in life that’s it," she told Love Magazine. 
In a later interview, she told Oprah that she's very aware that despite her dislike for the video, it's what made her famous. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
